questions.question_text: Software discovery models are stored in which table?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
It is D - ignore the typo

comments.content: All answers have the least ONE typo, and the right answer [D] has two typos :D Anyway, it's cmdb_sam_sw_discovery_model

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
From SAM on-Demand course: 

"Manage Microsoft Office 365 reserved licenses to accurately calculate annual true-up cost. 

Create reserve entitlements from existing Microsoft Office 365 subscription entitlements to add licenses to your subscription. The total cost of the reserved entitlement is included in the calculations for true-up cost and total spend on the product. 

Pay for the new licenses during your true-up process; after true-up, the reserved licenses are automatically converted into regular licenses. "

choices.C: To accurately calculate annual true-up cost and total spend on a product
choices.A: To reserve a block of licenses for a specific group of users and/or user role(s)
choices.B: To convert subscription licenses to regular per device licenses
choices.D: To convert regular per user licenses into subscription licenses

questions.question_text: What are Microsoft Office 365 reserved licenses used tor?
